title: Sailing
credit_line: Purchase: gift of the Hunt Foundation
provenance_text:
Hann Trier [1915-1999], Berlin, Germany; Galerie Der Spiegel, Cologne, Germany, until February 1965 [1]; purchased by Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, May 1965 [2].

Notes:
[1]. The painting was no. 112 in "The 1964 Pittsburgh International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" held at the Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1964 - January 1965. It was lent by Galerie Der Spiegel, Cologne, Germany.
[2]. The painting was purchased by Carnegie Institute from the 1964 International as a gift of the Hunt Foundation, Pittsburgh, PA. Payment to Galerie Der Spiegel was sent on February 2, 1965. The painting was accessioned later, on May 11, 1965.
